activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: The exchange has been updated from 'ammonium nitrate, as N' into 'ammonium nitrate' and therefore its amount has been scaled (multiplied) from 0.0009 kg by 2.8573 kg of 'ammonium nitrate' per kg of 'ammonium nitrate, as N'. Original comment of the exchange is: Calculated Value. Use as an explosive (Anfor).

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
input_name: market for diesel, burned in building machine
comment: Calculated Value using the total consumption of the plant and substract the amount used for the explosive. Reported in mÂ³.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment:
Calculated Value based on this estimation : the explosive Anfo is made of about 94 percent of ammonium nitrate and 6 percent of diesel.
Assumption : diesel low sulfur.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment:
Measured Value given by data provider (source : questionnaire). Reported as 161 kV mainly and 44 kV. The high voltage is between 44 kV and 315 kV in Quebec
Souce: http://www.hydroquebec.com/transenergie/fr/commerce/pdf/characteristics-and-target-values-of-voltage.pdf

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
input_name: market for hazardous waste, for incineration
comment: Measured Value given by data provider (source : questionnaire). Reported as diesel sent to incineration.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
input_name: heat production, heavy fuel oil, at industrial furnace 1MW
comment: Calculated Value. Calculation is based on reported fuel input (in m3), the Net Heating Value of the fuel and efficiency (1/Fuel_use).

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Estimation based on the amount of lubricant burned on site and with the amount of used oil sent to incineration plant.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Estimation based on the ecoinvent iron mine operation, crude ore, 46%, GLO dataset (ecoinvent v3).

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Estimation based on the amount of waste solvent.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Measured Value given by data provider (source : questionnaire). Reported as non-halogenated organic solvents sent to incineration.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Calculated Value.Transport of the ore from the extra pit to the concentrator.

activity_name: iron ore mine operation and beneficiation
comment: Measured Value given by data provider (source : questionnaire). Reported as waste oil with BPC concentration less or equal to 3 mg/kg and waste grease sent to incineration.
